name: Joe Arroyo
description: '''Álvaro José Arroyo González''' (also known as '''Joe Arroyo''' or '''El Joe'''; 1 November 1955 – 26 July 2011) was a Colombian [[salsa music|salsa]] and [[tropical music]] singer, composer and songwriter. He is considered one of the greatest performers of Caribbean and salsa music in his country and across Latin America. In 2018, ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' counted Arroyo's song "La Rebelión" as one of the "15 Best Salsa Songs Ever".
